title: Fri Post Show (06-03-22)
itunes:title: Fri Post Show (06-03-22)
description:
Bobby starts talking about why every generation thinks theirs is the worst. Bobby shares that he is loving the George Carlin documentary on HBO Max. We share behind the scenes about upcoming interviews we have with Adam Sandler, Gavin DeGraw and Elle King. We get to some news stories that we didn’t get to in the radio show involving Summer Fridays and a $6 million dollar covid scam.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
